Articles.Content:
i was building a starship-superheavy replica with the new shiny fairing texture when i saw that one of the vector engines was retextured. when i changed the fairing texture it also changed the engine texture. has anyone else had this happening?

https://postimg.cc/K4Dtftst

https://postimg.cc/rKnTSY13
I saw this also happen to the rectangular extendable antennae!
